system.description:
Blood is sacred to you, and what better way to honor the sacredness of it than to take it into yourself? Your dual infusions of supernatural essence and divine power grant you abilities beyond what could be obtained from either alone. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Constitution, Intelligence, or Charisma increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • When creating @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.sh0462lz1jwwm4rm]{Holy Water}, you can spend a hit die in place of the powdered silver.
  • Select a type of simple or martial melee weapon that you are proficient with, such as @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.pxazla3i4qaj6c29]{Longswords} or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.vstsnhl9n11usa5i]{Maces}. This becomes your favored weapon type. While wielding your favored weapon type, whenever you spend one or more hit dice in combat, the next attack made with your favored weapon type deals an additional 1d6 points of radiant or necrotic damage (choose when you take this feat) to the target.
  • Half your cleric levels count as bloodblade levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e-bloody-heretics.bloody-heretics.Item.rFdl6DX6T98SljpN]{Hemocratic Call} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e-bloody-heretics.bloody-heretics.Item.Rw64mkIKwTispsrX]{Sanguine Reach} features.
  • Half your bloodblade levels count as cleric levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.s4iiatrup3e3virw]{Channel Divinity} feature.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in bloodblade, 3 levels in cleric
